Chapter Previous

class gstVertex : public gstPoint

Mesh element representing a position in space with incident gstEdges directed into and out of the vertex.

From header file: gstVertex.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstVertex
~gstVertex
Functions
getKey Returns unique key identifying this vertex.
getNumIncidentEdges Returns the number of gstEdge elements incident upon this vertex.
incidentEdgesBegin Returns iterator positioned at the beginning of a list of incident gstEdges upon this vertex.
incidentEdgesEnd Returns iterator positioned at the ending of a list of incident gstEdges upon this vertex.
isStranded Returns TRUE if no edges are incident upon vertex.
addIncidentEdge Adds edge to list of incident edges along with direction of edge into or out of vertex.
removeIncidentEdge Removes edge edgeToRemove from this gstVertex.
Virtual Functions
